articles.description: The singer sparked excited reactions after he was pictured in a series of dresses and skirts in a spread for Vogue's December issue.
articles.content:
Harry Styles has made history as the first male to cover Vogue magazine solo.
The singer posed for the cover of the December issue in a Gucci jacket and dress, the latest ensemble of his to make wav… [+2192 chars]

articles.author: By Natasha Hooper For Mailonline
articles.title: Sir Paul McCartney planned to duet to Shake It Off with Taylor Swift - Daily Mail
articles.description: The musical legend, 78, and the songstress, 30, wanted to perform together as they were set to headline Glastonbury's 50th anniversary, but it was cancelled due to the  pandemic.
articles.content:
He will go down in Rock 'n' Roll history for his role in the iconic group, The Beatles. 
But now, Sir Paul McCartney wants to join forces with pop sensation, Taylor Swift, to play her song, Shake It… [+3078 chars]
